quote: If they don’t know your dreams, then they can’t shoot them down
author: Jermaine Lamarr Cole

quote: You gotta dream like you’ve never seen obstacles
author: Jermaine Lamarr Cole

quote: How many more times can I send this wooden pail down in that well, And pull it back up with the hope that it’s filled?
author: Jermaine Lamarr Cole

quote: Don’t give up your dreams for a nine to five It’ll pay your bills, but if you don’t love your job, then what’s the point?
author: Sir Robert Bryson Hall

quote: Any day you wake up, remember that it’s a good day
author: Sir Robert Bryson Hall

quote: Don’t live your life like it’s on lay-a-way Live it like it’s only a day away
author: Sir Robert Bryson Hall

quote: Start a corporation and bet on yourself every time
author: Leonard Eugene Hendricks

quote: Be wise enough to know that money can’t buy you happiness or lovers, But it’s gonna get you out the struggle
author: Jermaine Lamarr Cole

quote: If you aren’t getting rich doing what you love, Is there a point?
author: Sir Robert Bryson Hall

quote: If you don’t water your lawn, then it won’t stay green
author: Jermaine Lamarr Cole

quote: If you’re not getting richer every year, then you’re just backwards hustling
author: Leonard Eugene Hendricks

quote: You chase a dream, but then you stop? Guess you’ll never know
author: Jermaine Lamarr Cole

quote: A Gangster is someone that someone that take care of their family
author: Tauheed Epps

quote: This is your canvas Paint it how you want it
author: Jermaine Lamarr Cole

quote: The best revenge is to succeed
author: Fredrick Jamel Tipton

quote: Life hits different when you realize Life is a solo mission
author: Fredrick Jamel Tipton

quote: Look in the mirror Stop complaining, do what makes you happy, and go get those million’s
author: Leonard Eugene Hendricks

quote: Life is a movie So always switch to a better scene
author: Leonard Eugene Hendricks

quote: Work hard everyday Just like if you don’t got anything
author: Leonard Eugene Hendricks

quote: Don’t take offseason breaks Ball all season
author: Leonard Eugene Hendricks

quote: If you don’t work, you don’t eat So every single day, go as hard as you can
author: Leonard Eugene Hendricks

quote: If you really want to win You gotta take those steps
author: Leonard Eugene Hendricks

quote: Took a lot of losses, but still thankful Because it’s not really a loss if you gain something
author: Leonard Eugene Hendricks

quote: If you want to make a difference Always got to change something
author: Leonard Eugene Hendricks

quote: Don’t flex Show others they can also eat
author: Leonard Eugene Hendricks

quote: Be someone that wants it And not someone that has it
author: Aubrey Graham

quote: Feel like a seed planted in the dirt Feels like I’m just waiting to grow Maybe yesterday wasn’t the day But one thing that I know is that I’m going to get it right
author: Sir Robert Bryson Hall

quote: Don’t miss the boat if you don’t want to sit in coach, Go out and get where you’re going
author: Aubrey Graham

quote: Hustle + Passion = Success
author: Leonard Eugene Hendricks

quote: To never try is the ultimate fail
author: Jermaine Lamarr Cole

quote: If it’s meant to be, then it’ll be Even if it’s not, then I’ll still try
author: Jermaine Lamarr Cole

quote: Already have the date set, so live your life Because if you aren’t fulfilled in the end, you’ll just be filled with regret
author: Sir Robert Bryson Hall

quote: Never give up the sight Always remember to fight You never know what could happen, your life could change overnight
author: Sir Robert Bryson Hall

quote: You aren’t a man until you stop chasing your friends Think for yourself and make your own plans
author: Jermaine Lamarr Cole

quote: Sharpen your sword daily, don’t just keep it in the sheath
author: Sir Robert Bryson Hall

quote: Hustlers don’t stop, they keep going
author: Jeffrey Lamar Williams

quote: Scared money don’t make none
author: Jonathan William Davis

quote: Build your own pyramids, write your own hieroglyphs
author: Kendrick Lamar Duckworth

quote: Do your best Give it a hundred percent or don’t do it at all
author: Destin Choice Route

quote: Don’t spend too much time on captions, Spend more time on action
author: Aubrey Graham

quote: Supposed to own the ball, can’t worry about shooting free throws
author: Tyler Okonma

quote: Stay up thinking about my life, I want a lot, but will I get it all?
author: Aubrey Graham

quote: Can I be the man I thought I was? Will I make it like I thought I would? I gotta know
author: Jermaine Lamarr Cole

quote: Keep grinding, your life can change in one year And even when it’s dark out, the sun is shining somewhere
author: Jermaine Lamarr Cole

quote: Real man make sure his family good Real men never quit even when it’s slow
author: Leonard Eugene Hendricks

quote: Time’s too precious Gotta watch how I spend it
author: Olubowale Akintimehin

quote: What’s a life if you never take a risk? Ain’t a place too far, ain’t a dream too big So there’s nothing wrong with a little bit of fun
author: Malcolm McCormick

quote: Don’t close your eyes Life happens in a flash
author: Malcolm McCormick

quote: We all gotta lay in the bed we make, but that couldn’t be me
author: Aubrey Graham

quote: If you’re scared to take a chance, how we gonna get rich?
author: Jermaine Lamarr Cole

quote: The only time you should look back is to see how far you’ve come
author: A random Twitter post I saw

quote: Don’t wait for the stars to align, reach up and rearrange them the way you want. Create your own constellation
author: Pharrell Williams

quote: Life is all about perspective. The way you look at things will change everything
author: A random Twitter post I saw
